## Source: amazon-inspector (c51b40bdf891b2ad849d25f291b27e11a9c8dcae571ad90c75ee7d7f0696e248)
The package elf-stats-sparkly-garland-970 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cf9ebe4198caa6aa86f73ff6a8ba74a49422180a514cdaeb648c07aedb5d62f3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-sparkly-garland-970' @ 1.0.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
